additional_data.description: The spirit of the mineral nephrite. Compared to other minerals it is relatively flexible, and so is her mind, often to the surprise of those around her. Or maybe she's just really careless and does whatever she wants. Either way, she gets a lot of lectures from Diamond, but doesn't really mind.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Clear Chapter 1
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Exchange for 200 Pyroxene Shards
◦The cost increases by 20 Pyroxene Shards after each exchange
(200, 220, 240, 260)
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Pyroxene Shards during the "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" event.

main: "C'mon! Nothing wrong with taking a short break."
skill: "You might be able to dodge a few blows if you try."
summon: "Leave it to me. I'll do whatever I can."
